translations: 用调料腌渍……；（食物）经腌渍（marinate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Excuse me, ladies. You just keep marinating and I'll be right back.
sentences.translation: 失陪一下，小姐们，你们在这儿继续泡着，我就回来。

sentences.sentence: The extra marinating time will often help your brain come up with an easier solution.
sentences.translation: 额外深入思考时间往往会帮助你的大脑想出一个容易的解决方案。

sentences.sentence: Marinating meat for 10 minutes before grilling can reduce the formation of HCAs substantially.
sentences.translation: 烧烤前将肉用腌泡汁浸泡10分钟可以充分地减少杂环胺化合物的形成。
